faq.question: How do I reset my password?
faq.answer: You can reset your password by going to the settings page and clicking on 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions sent to your email.

faq.question: Where can I find my billing information?
faq.answer: Billing information is available in the 'Billing' section of your account settings. You can view past invoices and update your payment method there.

faq.question: How do I contact customer support?
faq.answer: You can contact our support team through the 'Customer Service' link on your profile page or by emailing support@ipollo.com.

faq.question: Is my data secure?
faq.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security practices to protect your data. For more details, please review our privacy policy.

chatPage.title: AI Chat
